channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 20:01 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 20:01 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
